buffs.name: Weaken Crystal (Human)
buffs.description: Upon reviving as a Human, the enemy's crystal HP on the stage battle is partly reduced. Reduced by 1% for every 5-star unit and 2% for every 6 star unit. Applied even when in Time Shop, and the unit's maximum crystal HP cannot be reduced by more than 20%.

buffs.name: Might of Fire
buffs.description: Increases stats of all soldiers (Attack / Defense / HP) by 7 levels for ever 5-star unit, 15 for every 6-star unit. Applies in Time Shop, but cannot exceed 150 levels. (However, [Might of Fire] is only applied in stage battles.)

atk_abil: Normal Attack: Blows flame sword aura while dancing a sword that atttacks and knocks back up to 3 enemies.
Skill Attack: Dances and causes a flame whirlwind that damages enemies on land and blows them up to the air.
Special Ability 1: Increases the game speed by 6%, movement speed of Human units by 5% and attack range by 3%.
Special Ability 2: Appears near the enemies at its first appearance, and casts a buff to increase its own movement speed and attack speed.
Special Ability 3: Unaffected by attacks by terrain above stage 10,000.
